name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Full Stack Engineer with 8 years of experience, specializing in high-performance web applications utilizing **React**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **PHP**, **HTML5**, and **CSS**. Proven ability to leverage **MySQL** databases for efficient data management while employing modern development practices such as TDD and CI/CD to ensure quality and rapid delivery.
Demonstrated leadership skills with a focus on mentoring junior developers and fostering a collaborative team environment. Well-versed in deployment using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, ensuring scalable and robust solutions. Strong communication skills enhance cross-functional collaboration, driving successful project outcomes.
Additionally, I bring extensive knowledge of cloud technologies and microservices architecture, having developed enterprise-grade platforms that adhere to compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Passionate about integrating innovative technologies to build solutions that solve complex challenges.
